name: Alchima
description:
A simple prototype of a sandbox-survival game where you need to collect resources using different combinations of elements. Some of your actions may lead to a climatic catastrophe! And don't forget to eat!

  • WASD to move
  • SPACEBAR to jump
  • E - crafting 
  • Arrows - rafting

This is my first development experience, of course I failed at some points  but I still have a lot of unrealized ideas. And if you are interested in my game, I will be glad if you leave a comment or contact me in Discord
